DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore certain characteristic , easily detect within regular primary care set , may indicate patient risk COPD ( 45 ≤ age ≤ 80 year smoke history ≥ 15 pack year ) prone diagnosis COPD accord Medical Products Agency guideline .
DOC.brief_title: A Descriptive Study Explore Certain Characteristics Patients Risk Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Primary Care Setting
DOC.criteria: Patients history smoke one pack cigarettes per day 15 year Known Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Known severe cardiovascular disease
